title: Kalshi voids some bets on Khamenei’s ouster because it’s ‘directly tied to death’
summary: Kalshi voided certain bets on Iranian Supreme Leader Khamenei's ouster following his death, citing a policy against markets directly tied to death. The predictive betting platform is refunding fees and reimbursing anyone who purchased shares after the event, though the handling has drawn criticism.
content:
In a statement on X, Kalshi CEO Tarek Mansour said his company would pay out positions on "Ali Khamenei out as Supreme Leader?" at the last trading price before his death. Mansour said that Kalshi doesn't "list markets directly tied to death" and that its rules are designed to "prevent people from profiting from death." In addition, Kalshi is refunding fees related to the market and reimbursing anyone who purchased shares after Khamenei's death. 
Some users have voiced anger at how the situation was handled, claiming that either Kalshi's rules should have been communicated more clearly, or that its markets should have been more narrowly wor …
Read the full story at The Verge.

title: Resident Evil Requiem leans too much on the series’ past
summary: Resident Evil Requiem aims to appeal to both longtime fans and newcomers by pairing new character Grace Ashcroft with series favorite Leon Kennedy. The game's first half delivers fresh horror gameplay, though it increasingly leans on the franchise's extensive history.
content:
Leon Kennedy, one of the game’s protagonists.	

Resident Evil turns 30 this year. The series is full of history - the new Resident Evil Requiem is technically the ninth mainline game, but there are a bunch of spinoffs, remakes, movies, and even a TV show - which can make it fun to follow for fans. But it's also intimidating for people like me who haven't played everything. The latest release, Resident Evil Requiem, tries to appeal to both sides by starring a new character, the cowering FBI agent Grace Ashcroft, and a series favorite, action hero Leon Kennedy.
Initially, it really works: the first half of Resident Evil Requiem is one of the freshest horror games I've ever played. But as t …

title: How MLB can make baseball relevant on a fast-changing internet

Die Liga muss ihre Content-Strategie anpassen, um Zuschauer im zeitgenössischen Medienumfeld zu erreichen.

es.title: Cómo la MLB puede hacer que el béisbol sea relevante en un internet que cambia rápidamente

La liga debe adaptar su estrategia de contenido para atraer a las audiencias en el entorno mediático contemporáneo.

title: Meta won’t let morality get in the way of a product launch
summary: Meta has added Name Tag, a facial recognition feature to Ray-Ban Meta glasses that identifies people in real-world interactions through the device's cameras. The feature raises significant privacy concerns as facial recognition technology becomes embedded in everyday wearables.
content:
There's never been a better time to add facial recognition to everything! The public at large is gradually becoming numb to our Palantirized surveillance state, and American communities are responding to the militarization of federal law enforcement with their own increasingly intricate webs of sousveillance. 
The Ray-Ban Meta glasses are sleek, unobtrusive wearables with front-facing cameras and a passthrough display in the right lens that can show maps, texts, social media posts, and more. Name Tag is a new feature that uses facial recognition to identify people you see in real life through the glasses. Perhaps the glasses would have soun …
Read the full story at The Verge.

zh.title: Meta不会让道德阻碍产品发布
zh.summary: Meta在Ray-Ban Meta眼镜中添加了Name Tag功能,这是一项面部识别功能,可通过设备摄像头在现实互动中识别人物。随着面部识别技术嵌入日常可穿戴设备,这项功能引发了重大隐私顾虑。

title: Honor’s Magic V6 is the first foldable with an IP69 rating
summary: Honor's Magic V6 becomes the first foldable phone to achieve an IP69 rating for water resistance while maintaining the title of world's thinnest book-style foldable and largest foldable battery. The phone launches in China later in March with international availability in the second half of 2026.
content:
The Magic V6 is just slightly more water-resistant than the Pixel 10 Pro Fold.	

For the third year running, Honor has announced what it says is the world's thinnest book-style folding phone. For the second year, it's combined that with the biggest battery in any foldable too. This year, for its third and final trick, the company went ahead and made sure it was the first foldable with an IP69 rating too.
The Honor Magic V6 was announced at MWC in Barcelona today, though Honor has played a bit fast and loose with timing to guarantee those three records: the V6 won't go on sale in China until some time later this month, and the international release is still months away, in the second half of the year, so Honor isn't sayi …
Read the full story at The Verge.

zh.title: Honor Magic V6是首款获得IP69等级的可折叠手机
zh.summary: Honor Magic V6成为首款获得IP69水阻等级的可折叠手机,同时保持世界最薄书式可折叠手机和最大可折叠电池的称号。该手机将于3月晚些时候在中国推出,国际版将于2026年下半年推出。

fr.title: Le Honor Magic V6 est le premier pliable avec une certification IP69
fr.summary: Le Honor Magic V6 devient le premier téléphone pliable à obtenir une certification IP69 pour la résistance à l'eau tout en conservant le titre de téléphone pliable de style livre le plus fin du monde et de plus grande batterie pliable. Le téléphone sort en Chine plus tard en mars avec une disponibilité internationale au second semestre 2026.

de.title: Honor Magic V6 ist das erste faltbare Telefon mit IP69-Zertifizierung
de.summary: Das Honor Magic V6 wird zum ersten faltbaren Telefon, das eine IP69-Zertifizierung für Wasserbeständigkeit erreicht, während es den Titel des dünnsten faltbaren Telefonbuches der Welt und der größten faltbaren Batterie behält. Das Telefon wird später im März in China mit internationaler Verfügbarkeit in der zweiten Hälfte 2026 auf den Markt gebracht.

es.title: Honor Magic V6 es el primer plegable con clasificación IP69
es.summary: Honor Magic V6 se convierte en el primer teléfono plegable en lograr una clasificación IP69 para resistencia al agua mientras mantiene el título de teléfono plegable de estilo libro más delgado del mundo y batería plegable más grande. El teléfono se lanza en China a finales de marzo con disponibilidad internacional en la segunda mitad de 2026.

title: The trap Anthropic built for itself
summary: Anthropic and other AI companies have long promised responsible self-governance, but without formal regulatory oversight, there are few mechanisms to hold them accountable. This governance gap creates a potential vulnerability as these companies shape the future of AI.
content: Anthropic, OpenAI, Google DeepMind and others have long promised to govern themselves responsibly. Now, in the absence of rules, there's not a lot to protect them.

zh.title: 人工智能公司为自己建造的陷阱
zh.summary: 人工智能公司长期以来承诺负责任的自我治理，但没有正式的监管监督，很少有机制能够追究它们的责任。这种治理缺陷在这些公司塑造人工智能未来时造成了潜在的脆弱性。

fr.title: Le piège qu'Anthropic s'est construit
fr.summary: Anthropic et d'autres entreprises d'IA ont longtemps promis une autogouvernance responsable, mais sans supervision réglementaire formelle, il existe peu de mécanismes pour les tenir responsables. Cette lacune de gouvernance crée une vulnérabilité potentielle alors que ces entreprises façonnent l'avenir de l'IA.

de.title: Die Falle, die Anthropic für sich selbst gebaut hat
de.summary: Anthropic und andere KI-Unternehmen haben lange Zeit verantwortungsvolle Selbstregulierung versprochen, aber ohne formale behördliche Aufsicht gibt es nur wenige Mechanismen, um sie zur Rechenschaft zu ziehen. Diese Governance-Lücke schafft eine potenzielle Schwachstelle, da diese Unternehmen die Zukunft der KI gestalten.

es.title: La trampa que Anthropic se construyó a sí misma
es.summary: Anthropic y otras empresas de IA han prometido durante mucho tiempo la autogobernanza responsable, pero sin supervisión regulatoria formal, hay pocos mecanismos para responsabilizarlas. Esta brecha de gobernanza crea una vulnerabilidad potencial mientras estas empresas moldean el futuro de la IA.
